final.OriginText: In 2023, the sales proportion of NEVs that were subcompact and below declined to 30%, from 61% in 2017. During the same periods of comparison, the mix of compact and midsize-to-large NEVs increased to 70% from 39%, reflecting the upgrade trend in terms of vehicle size.
